{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Broadcaster",
  "description": "CEOAfrica is a leading online media organization, Apart from reporting news objectively, CEOAfrica is also into production of world class documentaries, media consultations and partnerships, media coverage of seminars, workshops, training, conferences, production of jingles &amp; promos, digital ads, magazine production, web designs, red carpet event, including photo and video production. Our vision is to bring Africa to the world and the world to Africa with the African Union Agenda 2063 of the Africa we want.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Broadcaster

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 1 - 3 years of experience.
	Must be able to cast news and conduct interviews
	Must be able to do voice over
	Must be able to cover events and conduct Red carpet interviews
	Must be able to cast news.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;info@ceoafrica.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-10",

  },

Broadcaster Job at CEOAfrica




        
    

        
        CEOAfrica is a leading online media organization, Apart from reporting news objectively, CEOAfrica is also into production of world class documentaries, media consultations and partnerships, media coverage of seminars, workshops, training, conferences, production of jingles & promos, digital ads, magazine production, web designs, red carpet event, including photo and video production. Our vision is to bring Africa to the world and the world to Africa with the African Union Agenda 2063 of the Africa we want.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Broadcaster

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

            
    




	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 1 - 3 years of experience.
	Must be able to cast news and conduct interviews
	Must be able to do voice over
	Must be able to cover events and conduct Red carpet interviews
	Must be able to cast news.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@ceoafrica.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Client Liaison Officer",
  "description": "Nordica Fertility Centre was established by, Dr. Abayomi Ajayi, in association with Nordica International, Denmark, to provide the latest and most advanced assisted reproductive services for the treatment of male and female infertility and related issues.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Client Liaison Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	The Client Liaison Officer will support the patient care team by learning to manage communication between the fertility clinic and its clients.
	This role is part of a paid, structured training program that introduces you to the fertility treatment journey, patient coordination, and client service best practices.
	Developing the skills needed to provide empathetic, professional support to patients undergoing fertility treatments.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist senior client liaison officers in managing patient inquiries, appointment scheduling, and treatment coordination.
	Observe and learn how to explain treatment processes and administrative requirements to patients.
	Shadow patient consultations to understand patient care protocols and emotional support needs.
	Help maintain accurate client records in electronic systems; EMR.
	Learn how to handle sensitive and confidential information in line with privacy regulations.
	Participate in training sessions on fertility treatments, communication techniques, and clinic operations.
	Support the patient services team in collecting feedback and improving client satisfaction.


Requirements
Education:


	Bachelors&rsquo; degree in Healthcare Administration, Social Sciences, Psychology, Communications, or a related field.


Experience:


	No prior healthcare experience required, but a minimum of 3-5 years&rsquo; experience in customer service or patient care is an advantage.
	Experience handling clients or working in emotionally sensitive environments is an additional advantage


Skills:


	Strong communication and interpersonal skills with a compassionate approach.
	Willingness to learn and adapt in a clinical environment.
	Basic computer skills; familiarity with Microsoft Office and data entry.
	Good organizational and time management skills.
	Respect for confidentiality, professionalism, and patient privacy.
	Emotional maturity and resilience when dealing with sensitive topics (e.g., infertility, pregnancy loss).


Training Development:


	You will undergo structured on-the-job training with guidance from training coordinator, experienced client liaison officers and clinic managers.
	Training will include modules on fertility treatment basics, clinic software systems, communication protocols, and patient support.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resumes to:&nbsp; hr@nordicalagos.org&nbsp;using &ldquo;Client Liaison Officer Trainee Program&rdquo;&nbsp;as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-25",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Nordica Fertility Centre"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",

    }

    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",

    "value": {

      "minValue": 0,

    }
  }
}



Client Liaison Officer Job at Nordica Fertility Centre




        
    

        
        Nordica Fertility Centre was established by, Dr. Abayomi Ajayi, in association with Nordica International, Denmark, to provide the latest and most advanced assisted reproductive services for the treatment of male and female infertility and related issues.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Client Liaison Officer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description
     

            
    




	The Client Liaison Officer will support the patient care team by learning to manage communication between the fertility clinic and its clients.
	This role is part of a paid, structured training program that introduces you to the fertility treatment journey, patient coordination, and client service best practices.
	Developing the skills needed to provide empathetic, professional support to patients undergoing fertility treatments.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist senior client liaison officers in managing patient inquiries, appointment scheduling, and treatment coordination.
	Observe and learn how to explain treatment processes and administrative requirements to patients.
	Shadow patient consultations to understand patient care protocols and emotional support needs.
	Help maintain accurate client records in electronic systems; EMR.
	Learn how to handle sensitive and confidential information in line with privacy regulations.
	Participate in training sessions on fertility treatments, communication techniques, and clinic operations.
	Support the patient services team in collecting feedback and improving client satisfaction.


Requirements
Education:


	Bachelors’ degree in Healthcare Administration, Social Sciences, Psychology, Communications, or a related field.


Experience:


	No prior healthcare experience required, but a minimum of 3-5 years’ experience in customer service or patient care is an advantage.
	Experience handling clients or working in emotionally sensitive environments is an additional advantage


Skills:


	Strong communication and interpersonal skills with a compassionate approach.
	Willingness to learn and adapt in a clinical environment.
	Basic computer skills; familiarity with Microsoft Office and data entry.
	Good organizational and time management skills.
	Respect for confidentiality, professionalism, and patient privacy.
	Emotional maturity and resilience when dealing with sensitive topics (e.g., infertility, pregnancy loss).


Training Development:


	You will undergo structured on-the-job training with guidance from training coordinator, experienced client liaison officers and clinic managers.
	Training will include modules on fertility treatment basics, clinic software systems, communication protocols, and patient support.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resumes to:  hr@nordicalagos.org using “Client Liaison Officer Trainee Program” as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Research Analyst",
  "description": "Nordica Fertility Clinic, a foremost clinic in matters of fertility treatment, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Research Analyst
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Job Summary


	To collect, input, validate, and manage clinical and operational data with a high level of accuracy, ensuring the information is research-ready and supports evidence-based decision-making, performance tracking, and academic work.


Job Responsibilities
Data Collection &amp; Entry:


	Gather clinical and administrative data from multiple sources (patient records, procedure logs, digital systems).
	Enter data accurately into spreadsheets, databases, or research systems.
	Maintain well-organized and up-to-date records.


Data Validation &amp; Quality Control:


	Review entries to detect errors, inconsistencies, or missing values.
	Work with clinical team to clarify data discrepancies.
	Ensure high-quality, research-ready datasets.


Reporting &amp; Analytics Support:


	Generate daily, weekly, and monthly reports for management.
	Support in preparing datasets for clinical audits, studies, and publications.
	Provide data-driven insights for improving efficiency and outcomes.


Compliance &amp; Confidentiality:


	Ensure strict confidentiality and adherence to patient data protection policies.
	Follow ethical and regulatory standards for research and data governance.


Collaboration &amp; Communication:


	Work closely with doctors, and nurses to capture accurate data.
	Share timely updates and escalate issues.
	Assist in developing templates, dashboards, or processes to improve data reporting.


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree / HND in Statistics, Data Science, Health Information Management, Research Methods, or related field.
	1 - 3 years of experience in data entry, preferably in healthcare or research.
	Part-time work schedule (3 times/week onsite)
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, databases, and research/statistical tools (SPSS, STATA, or R).
	Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
	Ability to maintain confidentiality and integrity with sensitive data.
	Analytical thinking and ability to support research reporting.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp; hr@nordicalagos.org&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-25",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-31",
  "employmentType": "Contract",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Nordica Fertility Center"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",

Research Analyst Job at Nordica Fertility Clinic




        
    

        
        Nordica Fertility Clinic, a foremost clinic in matters of fertility treatment, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Research Analyst
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Job Summary


	To collect, input, validate, and manage clinical and operational data with a high level of accuracy, ensuring the information is research-ready and supports evidence-based decision-making, performance tracking, and academic work.


Job Responsibilities
Data Collection & Entry:
     

            
    




	Gather clinical and administrative data from multiple sources (patient records, procedure logs, digital systems).
	Enter data accurately into spreadsheets, databases, or research systems.
	Maintain well-organized and up-to-date records.


Data Validation & Quality Control:


	Review entries to detect errors, inconsistencies, or missing values.
	Work with clinical team to clarify data discrepancies.
	Ensure high-quality, research-ready datasets.


Reporting & Analytics Support:


	Generate daily, weekly, and monthly reports for management.
	Support in preparing datasets for clinical audits, studies, and publications.
	Provide data-driven insights for improving efficiency and outcomes.


Compliance & Confidentiality:


	Ensure strict confidentiality and adherence to patient data protection policies.
	Follow ethical and regulatory standards for research and data governance.


Collaboration & Communication:


	Work closely with doctors, and nurses to capture accurate data.
	Share timely updates and escalate issues.
	Assist in developing templates, dashboards, or processes to improve data reporting.


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree / HND in Statistics, Data Science, Health Information Management, Research Methods, or related field.
	1 - 3 years of experience in data entry, preferably in healthcare or research.
	Part-time work schedule (3 times/week onsite)
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, databases, and research/statistical tools (SPSS, STATA, or R).
	Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
	Ability to maintain confidentiality and integrity with sensitive data.
	Analytical thinking and ability to support research reporting.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:  hr@nordicalagos.org using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We&#39;re seeking an experienced Marketing Manager to lead our marketing efforts and develop strategies to drive business growth.
	The successful candidate will have a strong understanding of marketing principles and a proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing campaigns.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement comprehensive marketing strategies to achieve business objectives
	Conduct market research and analyze consumer behavior to inform marketing decisions
	Create and manage marketing campaigns across various channels (social media, email, advertising, etc.)
	Manage and optimize marketing budgets to achieve maximum ROI
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams (sales, product, creative) to align marketing efforts with business objectives
	Analyze and report on marketing metrics and performance
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in marketing


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree with 3 years of experience in marketing management or a related field
	Proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing campaigns
	Strong understanding of marketing principles and strategies
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
	Strong communication and collaboration skills
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines


Salary
N200,000 - N260,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hecrecruitment.hrconsulting@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Marketing Manager Job at Hec Recruit




        
    

        
        Hec Recruit is a full-service HR consulting firm with a unique approach. Since 2020 we have been helping our clients find a job best suited for their skills and interests, and helping local companies locate the best employees.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Manager

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We're seeking an experienced Marketing Manager to lead our marketing efforts and develop strategies to drive business growth.
	The successful candidate will have a strong understanding of marketing principles and a proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing campaigns.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement comprehensive marketing strategies to achieve business objectives
	Conduct market research and analyze consumer behavior to inform marketing decisions
	Create and manage marketing campaigns across various channels (social media, email, advertising, etc.)
	Manage and optimize marketing budgets to achieve maximum ROI
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams (sales, product, creative) to align marketing efforts with business objectives
	Analyze and report on marketing metrics and performance
	Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in marketing


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 3 years of experience in marketing management or a related field
	Proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing campaigns
	Strong understanding of marketing principles and strategies
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
	Strong communication and collaboration skills
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines


Salary
N200,000 - N260,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hecrecruitment.hrconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
